Articles.Content:
Well, it took me far to long to finish this project. It started with a rescue mission to Eve after a spaceplane stranded there. I decided to use 0.17 for parts since the initial concept was the video explaining the reason for the visual changes. Life got in the way and kept me from completing the project. I finished using 0.19.4 even though 20. came out. Either way, hope you enjoy it.

It is done with in game footage, but done for the purposes of cinematic. Some parts are modded just for the purpose of function and not all designs can be considered properly functional. Mostly the engines for the eve lift off. Proper vessel just ran computer too slow.

Length 15:36

Music is from the Armored Core 4 soundtrack
on the begining : here i am with jebediah kerbin XD

on the begining : here i am with jebediah kerbin XD

Oh, there are so many mistakes I caught after uploading. Is horrible. I watched it like 5 times before uploading, then there was that and the first news border messed up. With a 6 hour upload, I decided to just leave it.
